title: Watch.Dogs.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Watch.Dogs.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:

Year: 2014
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 3rd Person / Stealth
Developer: Ubisoft
Publisher: Ubisoft
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
VoiceLanguage: Eng |Rus
Crack: RELOADED



System Requirements:

Operating System: Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1) or Windows 8 (Please note that we only support 64 bit OSs.)
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400 @ 2.66Ghz or AMD Phenom II X4 940 @ 3.0Ghz
Memory: 6 GB
Video: 1GB compatible with DirectX 11 (Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 14 GB

Game information:

All related to each other. We depend on high-tech novelties of
the market, because only through them know what's going on in
the world. But progress has a dark side. Our every action leaves
a trace: every step we take, every stop, all that we like or dislike.
And it's not just us. Megacities are enmeshed in digital networks.
Urban infrastructure is controlled and operated by a complex system.
In Watch_DogsChikago submits Central Operating System (ctOS),
namely it contains information on all residents. And anyone who
gets access to it, will gain control over the city.
Aiden Pierce - a prominent hacker with a criminal record,
whose actions have caused the tragedy. To avenge his family,
he goes on the warpath - and you with it. Aiden is able to hack
and use everything that is connected to the city information
network - all that surrounds it. Access to security cameras,
loading personal data, tracking the location of people,
management of traffic lights and public transport ...
Chicago itself becomes your weapon.
You just need to learn how to use it.

Game Features:

Hacked CITY

Watch_Dogs events occur in carefully recreated Chicago,
whose life can be controlled by a conventional smartphone.
Switch the lights to the pursuers were stuck in a traffic jam.
Hold the departing train and jump into it to break away from the
chase. Spread the bridges to close the door. In a city where
everything is connected, Central Operating System will be your assistant.

STREET JUSTICE

Chicago has its own laws. Here respond to violence with violence,
and you have enough strength and skill to adopt rules. Melee and
shooting real as ever - realistic physics game will give odds to
many representatives of the genre. Mix and match the shooting
and hacking to gain an advantage in any situation. Local streets
are designed so that you can implement your own plan of attack.
In the top picture you'll have a more than 30 types of weapons.

RACE at high speed

In this paper, the game participated studio Ubisoft Reflection -
creators of the series Driver. Move to Chicago can be behind the
wheel of over 65 different vehicles. Each of them is carefully
modeled and behaves on the road most authentic.

Everything is under control

At the heart of Watch_Dogs is a brand new, specially developed
technology. You will enjoy incredible graphics and authentic
realism, your actions will affect the course of history and
human life, and the consequences of decisions will diverge
in a virtual world like ripples in the water.

FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT

In Watch_Dogs you can not only use the city's operating system
for their own benefit, but also for yourself the street.
Cut the way through the building or climb on
the roof to hunt down the target.

"Seamless" MULTIPLAYER

New level of interaction, cooperation and confrontation is
achieved thanks to a new system of organization of the
multiplayer that combines single-player and multiplayer
game together. No menus, no loading screens - only
situational multiplayer shooter in an open world.

Keep in touch and play ANEW

Treat yourself to an unforgettable experience with a helper
application that extends the capabilities of the console.
The innovative mobile platform will allow you to stay in
touch with friends, even outside the home. Watch_Dogs helper
application gives you access to the possibility of using a
dual screen that allows you to play anytime, anywhere.



Repack Features:

Watch_Dogs
Includes Update v1.03.471
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
Ability to download only the necessary voiceovers

Additions:

Signature Shot Pack
